category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 22 (Duty to Establish Sports Fair Committee)
contents: Article 22 (Duty to establish a fair sports committee) Member sport organizations and member city/provincial sports associations must establish a fair sports committee in their respective organizations in accordance with Article 38 of the member sport organization regulations, Article 38 of the member city/provincial sports council regulations, and this regulation. do. Revised 2022. 1. 24.
